Resource Utilities¶

CommonStatisticUtils¶

class CommonStatisticUtils¶

Bases: object

Utilities for manipulating the Statistics of Sims.

static get_statistic_initial_value(statistic_id: int) → float¶

Retrieve the Initial Value of a Statistic.

static get_statistic_max_value(statistic_id: int) → float¶

Retrieve the Maximum Value of a Statistic.

static get_statistic_min_value(statistic_id: int) → float¶

Retrieve the Minimum Value of a Statistic.

CommonResourceUtils¶

class CommonResourceUtils¶

Bases: object

Utilities for retrieving the Tuning files and instances of various resources. (Objects, Snippets, Statistics, etc.).

static get_instance_manager(instance_manager_type: sims4.resources.Types) → Optional[sims4.tuning.instance_manager.InstanceManager]¶

Get an InstanceManager for the specified type.

Parameters

instance_manager_type – The type of InstanceManager to get.

Returns

An InstanceManager for the specified type, or None if no InstanceManager is found.

static get_resource_key(resource_type: sims4.resources.Types, instance_id: int) → _resourceman.Key¶

Retrieve the resource key of a resource in the format: 00000000:00000000:00000000000000000

Possible Usages: - Retrieve the identifier of an Icon to display next to an Interaction in the Pie Menu. - Retrieve the identifier of an Image for display in Dialogs or Notifications.

Example Usage: icon_key = CommonResourceUtils.get_resource_key(Types.PNG, 1234)

Parameters

  • resource_type – The type of resource being loaded.

  • instance_id – The decimal identifier of the resource.

Returns

The resource key of an instance (format: 00000000(Type):00000000(Group):00000000000000000(Instance Guid)) or None if no instance was found.

static load_all_instances(instance_type: sims4.resources.Types) → ItemsView[Any, Any]¶

Load all instances of the specified type.

Parameters

instance_type – The type of instance being loaded.

Returns

All instances of the specified type.

static load_instance(instance_type: sims4.resources.Types, instance_id: int) → Any¶

Load an instance of the specified type.

Example Usage 1:

mood_instance = CommonResourceUtils.load_instance(Types.MOOD, CommonMoodId.CONFIDENT) # This will retrieve an instance for the Confident mood and will be of type statistics.mood.Mood

Example Usage 2:

buff_instance = CommonResourceUtils.load_instance(Types.BUFF, CommonBuffId.WALK_STYLE_ANGRY) # This will retrieve an instance for the Walk Style Angry buff and will be of type buffs.buff.Buff

Parameters

  • instance_type – The type of instance being loaded.

  • instance_id – The decimal identifier of an instance.

Returns

An instance of the specified type or None if no instance was found.

static load_instance_from_manager(instance_manager: sims4.tuning.instance_manager.InstanceManager, instance_id: int) → Any¶

Load an instance from the specified InstanceManager.

Parameters

  • instance_manager – The InstanceManager an instance will be loaded from.

  • instance_id – The decimal identifier of an instance.

Returns

An instance of the specified type or None if no instance was found.

static load_instances_with_any_tags(resource_type: sims4.resources.Types, tags: Tuple[str]) → Tuple[Any]¶

Retrieve all resources that contain the specified tag names within their tuning file.

Possible Usages: - Load all Snippet files containing properties with any of the specified tags.

Parameters

  • resource_type – The type of resource being loaded.

  • tags – A collection of tag names to locate within a tuning file.

Returns

A collection of resources that contain any of the specified tags.
